message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $100. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. Many of my previous customers have been thrilled with their purchase. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
Sounds good! I'll take it.  Let's hope it's as high-quality as you say.
